history.proof: intros. unfold is_Rbar_mult. hfcrush use: Rbar_mult'_opp_r, Rbar_opp_lt, Rbar_lt_not_eq, Rbar_mult_eq_0, Rle_not_lt, Rbar_plus_0_r, Rbar_finite_eq, Ropp_0, Rbar_minus_eq_0, is_Rbar_mult_p_infty_pos unfold: Rbar_opp, is_Rbar_mult, Rbar_mult, real, Rbar_lt, Rbar_minus, Rbar_inv, Rbar_mult' inv: option.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros x H. unfold is_Rbar_mult. destruct x. - intros H'. specialize (is_Rbar_mult_p_infty_pos (Finite r) H'). intros H''. rewrite H''. reflexivity. - destruct H'. - destruct H'.
